captions.text:
You know your mom's
gettin' evicted?

<i>I was just talkin'to your precious son</i>
<i>about this eviction situation.</i>

You plan on tellin' me
about this, huh?

Oh, honey, th-that was
just a mistake.

You're
a fuckin' liar.
Hey, man!

It's okay, don't worry.
I'm takin' care of...

Fuck, man! What the fuck
is your problem?

I'm out of here.
Can't go out with
someone like you.

Are you gonna let him just
talk to you like this?

<i>[Rabbit] Oh, my God. Lily.</i>
<i>Come here, baby.</i>

title: 8 Mile (7/10) Movie CLIP - Greg's Outta Here (2002) HD

comments.author: Kevin G.

comments.text:
I had always seen Eminem as nothing but a rapper, and for that, I looked 
down upon him. However, this video and all of the other clips reminded me 
that someone always has a back story to them, they always have a story to 
tell. If I had known before what his story was and what he went through, I 
would have respected him a lot more before, and I respect him now.﻿
